subject: In-container testing. Can anybody update on state of tools?
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve been looking into in-container testing and the tools out there look  a bit dated - Cactus and Junitee. They handle well junit 3.8.1 but not junit 4.3.

Hi,

I've been looking into in-container testing and the tools out there
lo=
ok  a bit dated - Cactus and Junitee. They handle well junit 3.8.1
but not =
junit 4.3. Supported versions of app servers are also a bit dated.

What ar=
e people doing to in-container integration testing?
